title: Look Back At David Letterman's Top 10 Moments
teaser: We look back at David Letterman's top 10 moments hosting the "Late Show" on CBS ahead of final episode on Wednesday.
contentencoded:
David Letterman's last day hosting "The Late Show" on CBS is Wednesday night, and to celebrate, NPR's TV critic Eric Deggans goes over his own Top 10 moments of Letterman's career. And don't worry, we include some Stupid Pet Tricks.

Letterman's Top 10 Moments

10.) Larry "Bud" Melman/Biff Henderson

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OQz4604x3P4

9.) Dave Works Taco Bell Drive Through

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ud3_uFM8iI

8.) Dave Alka Seltzer Suit

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EAu0USchCrI

7.) Drew Barrymore Flashes Dave

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nKc4dobR5sc

6.) Dave Owns Up To Adultery, Reveals Extortion Plot

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f7f9D4KclJw

5.) Cher Curses At Letterman

https://www.youtube.com/watch?t=20&v=BcblpszrwAk

4.) Joaquin Phoenix Pretends To Quit Acting

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RRb_3hCa72Y

3.) Stupid Pet Tricks

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NM4RELTuFG8

2.) Dave Introduces Heart Doctors After Heart Surgery

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KhFkC1Z18c8

1.) Dave's Speech In First Post-9/11 Show

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jbUg9wFpKME

Guest

  • Eric Deggans, NPR's TV critic. He tweets @Deggans.
